SELECT S.NO NO, S.NAME NAME, S.TARGET TARGET, S.POINT POINT, S.LIMIT LIMIT, S.TYPE TYPE, S.DEPTCODE DEPTCODE , S.SEASONCODE SEASONCODE,
P.NAME PRONAME,
L.ROOMCODE ROOMCODE, L.TIMECODE TIMECODE, L.DAYCODE DAYCODE FROM SUBJECT S, LECTURESCHEDULE L, PROFESSOR P WHERE S.NO = L.SBJNO AND S.PFNO = P.NO

SELECT S.NO NO, S.NAME NAME, S.TARGET TARGET, S.POINT POINT, S.LIMIT LIMIT, S.TYPE TYPE, S.DEPTCODE DEPTCODE , S.SEASONCODE SEASONCODE,
P.NAME PRONAME,
L.ROOMCODE ROOMCODE, L.TIMECODE TIMECODE, L.DAYCODE DAYCODE FROM SUBJECT S, LECTURESCHEDULE L, PROFESSOR P, STUDENT S2, LECTUREBASKET L2 WHERE S.NO = L.SBJNO AND S.PFNO = P.NO AND S2.NO = L2.STNO AND L2.SBJNO = S.NO AND STNO = ${STNO} ORDER BY S.NO ASC
